problem.label: 1. What types of decision records do we use in the Open edX project? (Pick 2)

checkboxgroup.choice: READMEs That is not correct. Try again.
ADRs That’s right! This is a type of decision record we use.
Docs.openedx.org That is not correct. Try again.
Working Groups That is not correct. Try again.
OEPs That’s right! This is a type of decision record we use.

problem.label: 2. Which ONE of these are NOT an Open edX extension?

choicegroup.choice: XBlock That is not correct. Open edX uses this extension
Django App Plugin That is not correct. Open edX uses this extension
LTI That is not correct. Open edX uses this extension
Custom Python Problems That is not correct. Open edX uses this extension
JS Input That is not correct. Open edX uses this extension
SCORM That is not correct. Open edX uses this extension
Raw OLX editing That is not correct. Open edX uses this extension
All of the above are used That’s right! All of these extensions are used ny Open edX.

problem.label: 3. What technologies does the Open edX platform use that we’d like to get rid of? (Pick 2)

checkboxgroup.choice: Python That is not correct. Try again.
Ruby/Sinatra That’s right! This is one technology we would like to get rid of.
Django That is not correct. Try again.
React That is not correct. Try again.
MongoDB That’s right! That’s right! This is one technology we would like to get rid of.
MySQL That is not correct. Try again.

problem.label: 4. What is the name of Open edX’s design system, based on Bootstrap?
5. True or False: The Open edX community has developed native iOS and Android Apps.

choicegroup.choice: True That’s right! The statement is true.
False That is not correct. Try again.

problem.label: 6. What does the Open edX platform use for events within the system? (Pick 2)

checkboxgroup.choice: openedx-events That’s right! That is what Oped edX uses for events within the system.
Python signals That is not correct. Try again.
React events That is not correct. Try again.
Django signals That’s right! That is what Oped edX uses for events within the system.

problem.label: 7. In 2017 the Open edX project began a replatforming effort. What were some of the reasons? (Pick 4)

checkboxgroup.choice: Make it faster to develop That’s right! This is one of the reasons.
Improve server performance That is not correct. Try again.
Improve frontend performance That’s right! This is one of the reasons.
Make analytics easier That is not correct. Try again.
Make it easier to approach the code That’s right! This is one of the reasons.
Improve API backends That’s right! This is one of the reasons.

problem.label: 8. What’s a micro-frontend?

choicegroup.choice: Similar to a microservice That is not the complete answer. Try again.
Decoupled That is not the complete answer. Try again.
Independently deployable That is not the complete answer. Try again.
Highly scalable That is not the complete answer. Try again.
All of the above That’s right! All choices describe a micro-front end.
